flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: Using just four folds and a priority envelope, make a useful and utilitarian wallet. Tyvek is perfect for drawing decorations and data!
guide.introduction_rendered: Using just four folds and a priority envelope, make a useful and utilitarian wallet. Tyvek is perfect for drawing decorations and data!

lines.text: Here's a priority envelope. A red line runs along the top and the bottom of the envelope. Measure eight inches along one of the red lines, in the middle of the envelope.
lines.text_raw: Here's a priority envelope. A red line runs along the top and the bottom of the envelope. Measure eight inches along one of the red lines, in the middle of the envelope.

lines.text: Now, measure five inches up from the red line to create a 5x8" rectangle.
lines.text_raw: Now, measure five inches up from the red line to create a 5x8" rectangle.

lines.text: But do not cut along the red line at the bottom of the envelope.
lines.text_raw: But do not cut along the red line at the bottom of the envelope.

lines.text: Open up the rectangle and lay it out flat (oriented like a portrait) so that it measures 10x8".
lines.text_raw: Open up the rectangle and lay it out flat (oriented like a portrait) so that it measures 10x8".

lines.text: Fold the top edge over one inch.
lines.text_raw: Fold the top edge over one inch.

lines.text: And fold the bottom edge up one inch.
lines.text_raw: And fold the bottom edge up one inch.

lines.text: Now re-fold along the red line.
lines.text_raw: Now re-fold along the red line.

lines.text: You'll now have a doubled over 4x8" rectangle.
lines.text_raw: You'll now have a doubled over 4x8" rectangle.

lines.text: Fold the bottom (red line / folded edge)up 1.25".
lines.text_raw: Fold the bottom (red line / folded edge)up 1.25".

lines.text: This flap should be high enough to hold a credit card.
lines.text_raw: This flap should be high enough to hold a credit card.

lines.text: Go back to the envelope and cut off the adhesive flap.
lines.text_raw: Go back to the envelope and cut off the adhesive flap.

lines.text: Apply the adhesive along each side to hold the pockets together.
lines.text_raw: Apply the adhesive along each side to hold the pockets together.

lines.text: Fold the adhesive over the back and trim any excess.
lines.text_raw: Fold the adhesive over the back and trim any excess.

guide.summary: A simple design for a billfold with two credit card pockets. Easiest tyvek wallet on the web!
guide.title: Penelope Popsicle Tyvek Wallet
